info.description: REST API Gateway for Shioaji Trading Provider.
info.title: Phoenix API

post.description: Activate the Certificate Authority for the user

get.description: Retrieve the expiration time of the user's Certificate Authority

post.description: Authenticate with username and password to get a JWT token

put.description: Modify the price or quantity of an open order

post.description: Submit a buy or sell order to the provider
Submit a multi-leg combo order to the provider
Manually trigger a status update for a combo order

account_id.description: Unique identifier for the trading account.

person_id.description: Unique identifier for the account holder.

signed.description: Whether the account has signed the trading agreement.

username.description: User's name associated with the account.

action.description: Buy or Sell action for this leg.

legs.description: Individual components of the combo contract.

exchange.description: Exchange where the security is traded.

x-enum-comments.DayTrade_DAY_TRADE_ONLYBUY: Buy first only. 先買後賣

x-enum-descriptions: Buy first only. 先買後賣

daytrade_short.description: Whether to allow short day trading.

modified_time.description: When the order was last modified.

x-enum-comments.OrderType_ORDER_TYPE_FOK: Fill or Kill. 全部成交或取消
x-enum-comments.OrderType_ORDER_TYPE_IOC: Immediate or Cancel. 立即成交或取消

x-enum-descriptions: Rest of Day. 當日有效

Fill or Kill. 全部成交或取消
